page.title: 19CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content:
In my spare time at school I played{ {"Flying Hedgehogs."}Tim was trying to catch us.We caught him in a powerful chamber and we turned him into a{ {Flying Hedgehog.}But he turned back and he kept catching us.We kept escaping and {Katherine}was the leader and she had the most powers and Tim was trying to find where our powers were kept.We soon found out so we tried to kill him but we could not. Faye Age 7 Years
{"Stuck in the mud"}is a running game.There is a child who is on and if that child catches another child,that child stands with his hands out,and a girl or boy goes under that girl or boys arm and they start running again. The last person who gets hit is on. Kathryn Age 7 Years
